roleset.name: make payment, give (perhaps for consideration)
roleset.note: REMIT-V NOTES: Framed by Neville. (from remit.01-v)

example.name: remit-v: all args
example.text: Recently , the " Duan and Duan Law Firm " remitted the claims, totaling 1.850million US dollars , to the three enterprises .
example.arg: the claims , totaling 1.850 million US dollars

example.name: remit-v: passive, with theme and recipient
example.text: During checks , it discovered that some corporations and individuals made useof foreign trading companies that [*T*-28] have import and export operation rights , [*] allowing them toperform " import agent " business , used false customs documents [*] to cheat on exchange , in order [*] toget foreign exchange capital through tax evasion and smuggling , while the foreign trading companies earnedagent commission fees without any cost ; there was also some international speculative capital which[*T*-29] infiltrated regular items [*] -30 to get remitted [*-30] into the country ; or entered the domestic stockmarket for speculating , or false custom documents were purchased [*-31] [*] to purchase exchange [*] to derive profit from the exchange differences within Chinese territory .

example.name: remit-n
example.text: The third question is, whether this is not a case in which we-1 are entitled *PRO*-1 to make a remit without the consent of parties.

example.name: remission-n
example.text: The earned credit will be posted to my transcript upon remission of payment of $50.00 per credit with a grade of “P” (Pass).
example.arg: of payment of $50.00 per credit with a grade of "P" (Pass)

roleset.name: abate in intensity
roleset.note: REMISSION-N NOTES: Based on Sharp data. Comparison to abate.01 and subside.01. No Vn or Fn classes. Framed by Katie. (from remission.01-n)

example.name: remission-n: non-cancer and with the elusive arg 0!
example.text: effects of catecholamine depletion on antidepressant-induced remission of depression
